answers.answer: Hi,I would suggest you to get yourself evaluated for peripheral neuropathy which can occur due to diabetes, Vitamin B 12 deficiency and thyroid dysfunction. Nerve compression due to spinal stenosis and peripheral vascular diseases also need to be looked into. I would suggest you to take B 12 supplements for now and schedule an appointment with your clinician.Thanks
